section.title: Filtering a UI Task List
section.para: This procedure describes how to filter tasks. You can filter a task list by time period, task status, and task state.

procedure.title: To Filter a UI Task List

step.para: Navigate to ConfigureTasks, then click on the My Other UI Tasks tab.
From the 24 Hour Time Period list, select the period of time to view the tasks.
For Task Status, select the check boxes next to the status to view.
From the Tasks State list, select the state to view.
